creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
inscription: Left: 一九五一年作　しだれ桜と門 {1951nen saku, ?????}; bottom, in grey: [Cherry Blossoms by the Gate], in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida] [For Ulrike Pietzner]
markings: LRC: Red artist's seal 吉田遠 {Yoshida Tō}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
title: Cherry Blossoms by the Gate
